title: UNOFFICIAL CM12.1 for LG V10 H901 T-Mobile
description:
All Credit goes to genesixxbf3 from the XDA forums.  All the installation instructions(and these downloads and more) are on this page:" http://forum.xda-developers.com/tmobile-lg-v10/development/rom-cyanogenmod-12-1-lg-v10-t3305154
"
Go to it for any information or questions.  I know nothing about this other than how to flash. 

I'm simply making a torrent because the only download for this so far is going extremely slow(was going ~20-30K/sec).  I'll try to keep up with his future updates on this torrent and upload those as well.  What is included in this is the CM12.1 ROM recovery flash-able and the Nano Google Apps that is recovery flash-able. 


I will copy his first post but go to the thread list above for updated information:

:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

Quoted by: genesixxbf3  : XDA Forums

- Download the CyanogenMod zip(s). (see Downloads)
- Copy the CyanogenMod zip to internal or external sdcard.
- Install a compatible Recovery. (see Downloads)
- Boot into Recovery.
- Perform a NANDroid backup of your current ROM. (Optional)
- Wipe data & cache partitions of your device.
- Flash CyanogenMod.
- Optional: Install the Google Apps addon package. (see Downloads)
- Reboot!

DOWNLOADS
CyanogenMod builds:llama.noip.me/cm-12.1/h901

Google Apps:  
http://opengapps.org/ (choose arm64, 5.1, nano)


SOURCES
Kernel sources: https://github.com/CyanogenMod/andro...el_lge_msm8992
v10 common device tree: https://github.com/genesixx/android_...lge_v10-common
H901: https://github.com/genesixx/android_device_lge_h901
Proprietary files: https://github.com/TheMuppets/proprietary_vendor_lge

XDA:DevDB Information
cm v10, ROM for the T-Mobile LG V10

Contributors
genesixxbf3
ROM OS Version: 5.1.x Lollipop
Based On: cm

Version Information
